SELECT * FROM ( SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS RN, P.P_ID id,P.NAME,P.SEX,P.CSNY,P.CSDZ,P.XZDZ,P.SHJN,P.XYCS,P.GZSC,P.HYZK,P.SFZHM ,P.SJHM, P.WXHM,P.QQHM,P.JTZK,P.GSZW FROM (SELECT @rownum:=0) r, P_PERSON_INFO P WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{param.name},'%'))
AND XYCS LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{param.xycs},'%'))
AND SEX LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{param.sex},'%'))
ORDER BY CREAT_TIME DESC ) B WHERE RN BETWEEN (#{param.pageNo}-1 )* #{param.pageSize} +1 AND #{param.pageNo}* #{param.pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(1) CNT FROM P_PERSON_INFO P WHERE 1=1
AND NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{param.name},'%'))
AND XYCS LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{param.xycs},'%'))
AND SEX LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT(#{param.sex},'%'))
